results.definition: the latter part of the day (the period of decreasing daylight from late afternoon until nightfall)
examples: he enjoyed the evening light across the lake

results.definition: (Old Testament) Adam's wife in Judeo-Christian mythology: the first woman and mother of the human race; God created Eve from Adam's rib and placed Adam and Eve in the Garden of Eden

examples: he always arrives on the eve of her departure
on the eve of the French Revolution
